 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
-result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
+result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd).trim());
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();

 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
+int a=0;
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));

 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
+int indexSelection=0;
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
+if(str==null){

+}

 if(upper!=str.length()){

 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {

 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
+if(result==null){
+return null;
+}
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {

 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {

 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
-result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
+result.append(str.substring(0,upper)+" votes");
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/lang/lang_45_buggy/src/java/org/apache/commons/lang/WordUtils.java[585,642]
------------Candidate---------------
 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
+assert (!appendToEnd.isEmpty());
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
-result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
+result.append(str.substring(0,upper).subSequence(0,6));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 }

 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
-result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
+result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd.trim()));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
-result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
+result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd.trim()));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/lang/lang_45_buggy/src/java/org/apache/commons/lang/WordUtils.java[585,642]
------------Candidate---------------
 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
-result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
+result.append(str.substring(0,upper)+"/logout");
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/lang/lang_45_buggy/src/java/org/apache/commons/lang/WordUtils.java[585,642]
------------Candidate---------------
 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
+assert (str!=null);
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 }

------------Candidate---------------
 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
+if(str.isEmpty()){
+str=null;
+}
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));

 }
 }else {

 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();

 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/lang/lang_45_buggy/src/java/org/apache/commons/lang/WordUtils.java[585,642]
------------Candidate---------------
 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
+if(str.isEmpty()){
+System.out.println("Team has to have a name");
+return null;
+}
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 }else {

 }

 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
-result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
+result.append(str.substring(0,upper-1));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
-result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
+result.append(str.substring(0-1,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
+result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
+result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();

------------Solution---------------
 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
+if(str==null){
+return "";
+}
+if(appendToEnd==null){
+return str;
+}
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
+if(str==null){
+return "";
+}
+if(appendToEnd==null){
+return str;
+}
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }

 public static String abbreviate(String str,int lower,int upper,String appendToEnd){
 if(str==null){
 return null;
 }
 if(str.length()==0){
 return StringUtils.EMPTY;
 }
 if(upper==-1||upper>str.length()){
 upper=str.length();
 }
 if(upper<lower){
 upper=lower;
 }
 StringBuffer result=new StringBuffer();
 int index=StringUtils.indexOf(str," ",lower);
 if(index==-1){
+if(upper==3){
+System.out.println("debug");
+}
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 if(upper!=str.length()){
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
+}
+if(upper==3){
+System.out.println("debug");
 }
 }else {
 if(index>upper){
 result.append(str.substring(0,upper));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }else {
 result.append(str.substring(0,index));
 result.append(StringUtils.defaultString(appendToEnd));
 }
 }
 return result.toString();
 }
